components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple networks in French Guiana

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple networks in French Guiana. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Multiple networks in French Guiana. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Receipt Delays to Uintah Basin Electronics Telecommunications in United States for a Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery receipt delays when sending messages to Uintah Basin Electronics Telecommunications in the United States for a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 November 2025 at 18:00 PST until 21 November 2025 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Mexico SMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 November 2025 at 22:00 PST until 23 November 2025 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboard visualization partner in the US will be conducting planned maintenance on Sunday, Nov 23rd, 2025, 10:00 PM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is expected to last up to 2 hours. During this time, there will be no-downtime on the service and the platform will remain fully available for users during this time. In case of any issues faced, If you encounter an error, please retry your action or reach out to us.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboard visualization partner in the US will be conducting planned maintenance on Sunday, Nov 23rd, 2025, 10:00 PM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is expected to last up to 1 hour. During this time, there will be no-downtime on the service and the platform will remain fully available for users during this time. In case of any issues faced, If you encounter an error, please retry your action or reach out to us.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body:
The AT&T network in the United States is conducting an emergency maintenance from 20 November 2025 at 20:00 PST until 21 November 2025 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from AT&T United States handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 10 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
12 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 12 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
17 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 17 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
24 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 24 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
26 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe
